abilityDescription: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into various types of gas

abilitiesRevealed.description: Caesar can create deadly poisonous gas to kill his victims, as demonstrated when he murdered a centaur patient.
Caesar can purify poisonous air, which he used to manipulate the prisoners into believing he saved them.

reveals.information: The Gasu Gasu no Mi can create lethal poisonous gases and also purify contaminated air

abilityDescription: Allows the user to create a spherical space where they can manipulate anything within it, including performing miraculous surgical operations

abilitiesRevealed.description: Law can surgically attach body parts from different living creatures, as demonstrated by grafting animal legs onto paralyzed humans to create centaurs.

reveals.information: The Ope Ope no Mi can graft body parts from different living creatures together
